> [cosmologica](#comment_6_1PiXrhT1UjMZmJc5WFhfUxourdfapeHJ8o): Is there a ZeroNet app for mobile?

Yes there is, but its still new so its not fully featured yet.

Kaffie, I host zeronet sites so people can say whatever they want. I support all speech. I disagree that hate speech is bad regardless of your definition. Thankfully with zeronet I can keep alive the sites that you seem to disagree with.
